strapiEvent.name: Ozarktober 2022 - Oct 8 - 30
strapiEvent.description:
Downtown Springdale has announced its line-up of events for Ozarktober 2022! 

  • Celebrate: Ozarktober is a celebration of fall in the Ozarks and is held during October in downtown Springdale. This year, many events will take place outdoors and in the Outdoor Dining District from October 8-30. 
  • Fall fun: Events include live music and local brews, artist showcases, a multi-course brunch on a train, a haunted train, a bonfire, and more! Tickets for the events range from $0-$100 and are on sale now. 

Click HERE for more information.
